remarks: A scalar times the zero functional is the zero functional.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lcdvs0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvs0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvs0.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdvs0.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
lcdvs0.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvs0.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` C ) $.
lcdvs0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` C ) $.
lcdvs0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvs0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. R ) $.
lcdvs0N $p |- ( ph -> ( X .x. .0. ) = .0. ) $.
